item.title: Teleport help please
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

[code=javascript]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::home")&& playerRights >= 0){
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3502;
sendMessage(“You Teleported to home.”);

}
[/code]

PS: I have a 317 server/client
